attributes.action: Ensure the Ban on Conversion Therapy Includes Transgender People
attributes.additional_details: This will assist in preventing the vast amount of trans deaths experienced every year. It will ensure a trans community that will thrive. It will aid in putting a stop to normalising discriminatory practice.
attributes.background: The Government announced earlier today a U-Turn on their plans on banning conversion therapy in the UK, stating that they will keep it in place for transgender individuals. This is a fundamental breach of the Human Rights Act and the UK’s own discriminatory law.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure Trans people are fully protected under any conversion therapy ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613556

Ban LGBT+ Conversion Therapy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613518
